comments.raw_text:
It would be great to implement BrowserID into QMO as a single sign on mechanism.   Someone's already built a wordpress plugin for it, so hopefully implementing it wont be too hard.

Resources:

What is Browser ID?: https://browserid.org/
How does it work?  http://lloyd.io/how-browserid-works
Github repo: https://github.com/mozilla/browserid
BrowserID Wordpress plugin: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/browserid/
Sample site its used on: http://myfavoritebeer.org/
comments.author: chung808@gmail.com
